title: I forgot to click on confirm ESA and exams are starting on 8th help
content: I forgot to click on confirm ESA and exams are starting on 8th help is there gonna be consequences

comments.body:
No ESAs for you /s

Jokes aside, by default you're enrolled for all ESAs. The system is in place only if you want to withdraw or drop.
It's mainly for withdraw/drop subjects so u good
